summary: Feature request to ensure built-in query responses use RawValue for consistency with the features specification. This is a follow-up to issue #574 implementation.
userImpact: Ensures consistency in query response handling across the PHP SDK, aligning with established patterns.
proposedFix: Make built-in queries return raw value as specified in features issue #604
resolutionDetails: Marked as duplicate of another issue
keyQuote: [Feature Request] Built-in query responses should use "RawValue"
